cpl.title: $:/plugins/TWaddle/SideEditor
cpl.description: A live editor floating by the river side...
cpl.name: SideEditor
cpl.readme:
SideEditor floats a tiddlers editor by the story river side.

You see the changes live in the tiddler and you can scroll to, and reference, stuff from other tiddlers while you edit.

!!Usage

    Activate SideEditor by clicking the tiddler tool 

or page tool

    Re-size it via the "handle bars" at upper-right and lower-left corner
    Switch focus between Sidebar, River and SideEditor by hovering

!!Split-out window  

    Distraction free authoring by maximizing the window (Do test it!)
    Stick window by using 3'd party software (e.g) to easily collect data from other applications and tabs into your wiki

''Installation'' - drag and drop the link $:/plugins/TWaddle/SideEditor into your TW.

Mat von TWaddle <:-)
